title: Transformations in Academic Library Education Practices in Response to COVID-19: Development of Blended Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic library services and digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Exploring Innovative Library Education Services for Entry-Level Professionals in Medical, Legal, and Technical Fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three strategies for utilizing academic information that have evolved post-COVID-19 in blended learning environments.
Learners can design real-time/asynchronous library education modules using digital tools (e.g., video conferencing platforms, LMS).
Learners can propose educational content development plans that reflect learners' emotional needs.
Learners can suggest improvements to consortium-level support systems.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
